remarks: The product rule for everywhere-differentiable functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvaddf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvaddf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvaddf.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X --> CC ) $.
dvaddf.df $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D F ) = X ) $.
dvaddf.dg $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D G ) = X ) $.
dvmulf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( F oF x. G ) ) = ( ( ( S _D F ) oF x. G ) oF + ( ( S _D G ) oF x. F ) ) ) $.
